sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Card class="border">
    <template #title>
      Energy Ratio
    </template>
    <template #body>
      <Chart type="doughnut" :data="chartData" :options="lightOptions" />
    </template>
  </Card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
        return {
            chartData: {
                labels: ['Fat','Protein','Carbs'],
                datasets: [
                    {
                        data: [300, 50, 100],
                        backgroundColor: ["#FF6384","#36A2EB","#FFCE56"],
                        hoverBackgroundColor: ["#FF6384","#36A2EB","#FFCE56"]
                    }
                ]
            },
			lightOptions: {
				plugins: {
                    legend: {
                        labels: {
                            color: '#495057'
                        }
                    }
                }
			}
        }
    }
};
</script>

<style>
.border {
  border-top: 4px solid var(--gray);
}
</style>
